massmessage-content-invalid: This page does not contain a valid MassMessage delivery list.
massmessage-content-empty: There are no pages in this list.
massmessage-create-import: Import pages from an existing list or category
massmessage-create-exists: A page already exists at the specified title.
massmessage-create-nopermission: You do not have permission to create a list at this title.
massmessage-create-tojsonerror: The list could not be encoded for storage.
massmessage-edit-header: List one title per line, and use title@domain (e.g. User talk:Example@en.wikipedia.org) to specify a page on a different wiki, if cross-wiki delivery is enabled.
massmessage-edit-invalidtitle: There is no valid MassMessage delivery list at the title.
massmessage-edit-nopermission: You do not have permission to edit the list.
massmessage-edit-tojsonerror: The list could not be encoded for storage.
